name: James Bond 007: A View to a Kill
storyline: You are James Bond 007 and you must stop Max Zorin from destroying Silicon Valley and dominating the microchip market. If you fail, Max Zorin will flood Silicon Valley by creating a major earthquake. The gameplay is similar to Goldfinger but it doesn't follow the movie as closely. The game will take you to the Siberian Mountains, Paris, and San Francisco.
summary: "James Bond 007: A View to a Kill" is a text adventure based on the James Bond film of the same name. Released in 1985 for DOS, Macintosh and Apple II computers, it was developed by Angelsoft, Inc. and published by Mindscape Inc.
